job.title: Android Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>** Multiple Roles - Immediate Interview &amp; Start **</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>W2 (Preferred). </strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>TRAVEL INDUSTRY CLIENT (FORTUNE COMPANY)</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Role:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Android Software Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Irvine, CA (Remote till Covid)</strong></p><p><strong>Duration:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Long Term Contract</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Description:</strong></p><ul><li>Should have 4 - 6 years of experience</li><li>Should have good experience with Android</li><li>Good experience on Java, RxJava</li><li>Expertise required in Kotlin, RabbitMQ, MQTT</li><li>Must have worked in Junit, Git, Gradle</li><li>Ideal candidate would be responsible for leading development of Android-based passenger application for DFP’s In-Flight Entertainment system.</li><li>Must be a Team player</li><li>should have excellent written and verbal communication skill.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>If you are interested to pursue this opportunity, please send your updated resume to Sam@agiledatapro.com</p>
